meaningMnemonic: You have a <radical>poem</radical> about <radical>winter</radical> that you <radical>say</radical> to <kanji>warn</kanji> people against going outside. It's cold and dangerous in winter! You <kanji>admonish</kanji> anyone and everyone you see going out there with your scary winter poem.
readingMnemonic: To make sure people listen to your <kanji>warn</kanji>ing, you threaten to take away their <reading>ca</reading>ke (けい). People will do anything for cake, so when you bring it up, they actually take your attempts to warn them about winter seriously.
